content: You have to be gentle... don't underestimate these little things. A flutter of their wings here might alter the trajectory of the stars elsewhere.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-正在执行的动作-NPC正在抓虫-1005幻雪_特殊反馈

content: To catch these little creatures, you have to be gentle... gentler than the flutter of a butterfly's wings. {A打喷嚏}Yeep, it flew off...
